title: Nebula Dye
summaries: Nebula Dye is a Hardmode, endgame dye crafted using Nebula Fragments dropped by the Nebula Pillar in the Lunar Events. The dye gives the player a pink/purple shiny look on armor, equipment or accessories and looks like stars are moving rapidly upward on anything with the dye. As with the other lunar dyes, the Nebula Dye can not be combined with any other dyes.
